Name: Amulet
Description: An amulet of red-stained steatite representing the Girdle of Isis. According to Chapter 156 of the Book of the Dead this symbol was to be placed on the neck of the mummy to ensure 'the power of Isis will be the protection of his body'. The amulet is an open loop of material from whose bound lower end hangs a sash flanked by two folded loops.
